game.title: The Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
game.description: The village elder has approached you with a plea for help. The temple, hidden deep within the mystical forest, is said to contain an ancient relic that will bring prosperity back to our village. However, the temple is rumored to be cursed and many have attempted to retrieve the artifact but never returned.

tasks.objective: Gather information about the Lost Temple's location
tasks.description: Speak to the local villagers and gather information about the temple's whereabouts.

tasks.objective: Retrieve the ancient map from the village archives
tasks.description: Search the village archives for a map that will lead you to the Lost Temple.

tasks.objective: Navigate through the mystical forest and reach the Lost Temple
tasks.description: Follow the path indicated on the ancient map and navigate through the treacherous forest to reach the temple.

tasks.objective: Solve the puzzles and unlock the artifact chamber
tasks.description: Use your wits to solve the puzzles that guard the artifact chamber and retrieve the ancient relic.
tasks.location: Lost Temple of the Moon Goddess
